title: Daisy: How to Become the Duke’s Fiancée - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Betrayal   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   First Love   Marriage of Convenience   Nobles   Past Plays a Big Role   Pretend Lovers   R-18   Royalty   Time Travel
author: Lisabel   리사벨
description:
Marry for 3 years, get 5 billion won vs. work for 60 years without pay. Which choice will Daisy make?

“I’ll get a job as a contract wife. I will be a good partner.”

A political marriage of convenience. The rules of the contract are simple. Love is prohibited. Divorce is guaranteed in three years. And most importantly do not make your husband fall in love.

“The men in my family are specialized in murder.”>
